title: Isolated farmsteads in the United States

content.question: Isolated farmsteads in the United States evolved as a result of all of the following EXCEPT

choices.label: physical barriers preventing communal farm practices

content.answer: physical barriers preventing communal farm practices

unit.text: 5: Agriculture and Rural Land-Use Patterns and Processes

skill.text: Skill 1.D: Describe a relevant geographic concept, process, model, or theory in a specified context.
